# maas_fabric (Data Source)

Provides details about an existing MAAS network fabric.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "maas_fabric" "default" {
  name = "maas"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The fabric name.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
